properties.entry: SELECT RNUM , REPORT_NO , REPORT_TITLE , REPORTED_ID , REPORT_FILE , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORT_DATE , REPORT_MODIFY , T_F , USER_ID FROM RELIST WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT REPORT_NO , REPORT_TITLE , REPORTED_ID , REPORT_FILE , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORT_DATE , REPORT_MODIFY , T_F , USER_ID FROM REPORT WHERE REPORT_NO = ?
